pageTitle: Castelli Prologo 3 Cycling Jersey - Long-Sleeve - Men's | Competitive Cyclist
title: Men's Apparel
textBeforeTable: Castelli Size chart 30 days Manufacturer Warranty: race, training Recommended Use: full-length Zip: 3 rear, 1 zip security Pockets: tight Fit: polyester Material: Tech Specs The Castelli Long-Sleeve Prologo 3 has a full compliment of reflective elements for low-light safety, and it's available in Black/red and White/black with sizes ranging from Small through to XXX-Large. Adding to that design is a full-length camlock zipper that allows ventilation fine tuning that won't migrate when pedaling. The Prologo 3's lower hem has a wide silicon gripper to prevent riding up, and the three rear pockets are secure and easy to reach when riding. Castelli also added a zippered key pocket to ensure that your keys are still with you at the end of your ride. For ventilation, Castelli inserted a mesh panel across the the back of the jersey. textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
